SEARCH
Package fx

Class DrawingCursor

java.lang.Object
fx.DrawingCursor
public class DrawingCursor extends Object
This class create a Cursor that can be use to draw line inside a canvas. Any line can be drawn by using the old and current coordinate as start and end point. Each cursor got it own configuration (color, opacity, ect...).

  • Field Details

    • NONE

      public static final int NONE
      Constant to for direction modificator, it can be use to change the comportement of a cursor when changing direction.

      No changement

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MIRRORED_AXIS

      public static final int MIRRORED_AXIS
      Constant to for direction modificator, it can be use to change the comportement of a cursor when changing direction.

      While change direction as if the point follow an other point around a central axe

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MIRRORED_POINT

      public static final int MIRRORED_POINT
      Constant to for direction modificator, it can be use to change the comportement of a cursor when changing direction.

      While change direction as if the point follow an other point around a central point

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • DrawingCursor

      public DrawingCursor(int id, double xStart, double yStart, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, double opacity, double thickness, boolean active)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      id - id for the cursor, it as to be unique for an independant cursor to be created.
      xStart - start position on the X axis
      yStart - start position on the Y axis
      color - start color, dont set the alpha setting here
      opacity - start opacity
      thickness - start thicness
      active - must be true if the cursor will be directly use to draw

    • DrawingCursor

      public DrawingCursor(int id, DrawingCursor existingCursor, boolean active)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      id - id for the cursor, it as to be unique for an independant cursor to be created.
      existingCursor - cursor to copy the configuration from (copy all except: direction, active state, id and directionModificator)
      active - must be true if the cursor will be directly use to draw

    • DrawingCursor

      public DrawingCursor(int id)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      id - id for the cursor, it as to be unique for an independant cursor to be created.

    • setColor

      public void setColor(javafx.scene.paint.Color newColor)
      Set the color that will be use to draw. It is not recommanded to use any Color object that as an other value than 1 for alpha.
      Parameters:
      newColor - Color to set

    • setOpacity

      public void setOpacity(double newOpacity)
      Set the opacity that will be use to draw.
      Parameters:
      newOpacity - opacity/alpha value betwen 0.0 and 1.0

    • setThickness

      public void setThickness(double newThickenss)
      Set the Thickness that will be use to draw.
      Parameters:
      newThickenss - size in pixel

    • setActive

      public void setActive(boolean status)
      Set the active status of the cursor. Its recommanded to have only one cursor active at a time.
      Parameters:
      status - new status

    • setVisible

      public void setVisible(boolean status)
      Set the visible status of the cursor.
      Parameters:
      status - new status

    • move

      public void move(double value)
      Set the current X and Y position by following the current direction
      Parameters:
      value - length in pixel to go through

    • turn

      public void turn(double changeInDirection)
      Turn the cursor
      Parameters:
      changeInDirection - change in degrees

    • linkToOtherCursor

      public void linkToOtherCursor(int modificator, DrawingCursor targetCursor, double[] referringPoint)
      Configure the cursor so that it is set in the right place and facing the correct direction when applying a direction modificator. By exemple it can be use to copy a cursor and applying an axial symmetrie on the copy
      Parameters:
      modificator - modificator selected (DrawingCursor.NONE, DrawingCursor.MIRRORED_AXIS, DrawingCursor.MIRRORED_POINT)
      targetCursor - cursor to copy the configuration from
      referringPoint - array of coordinnates of points used depending of the direction modificator use. (exemple, points coordinate's where the line of a axial symmetrie passes )

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
